p: A recent study has found that coronaviruses can persist on commonly touched inanimate objects like door knobs for about 9 days and for up to a month under low temperatures (about 4–5 °C). Steps as simple as regular disinfection procedures using 70% ethanol or 0.1% sodium hypochlorite are highly effective in eradicating coronaviruses (Kampf et al. 2020). Therefore, use of these simple disinfection procedures in houses, hospitals and various public places will significantly reduce 2019-nCoV spread.
